monster.name: Spirit Animal [2024]
monster.save: Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +2, Cha +0
monster.immune: Necrotic, Poison, Radiant; Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained
monster.conditionImmune: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 4 + 4 x your ranger level. The spirit has a number of Hit Dice equal to your Ranger Level.

trait.name: Luminous Movement
trait.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. When it ends its movement in another creature's space, that creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or become Blinded. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Spiritual Bond
trait.text: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the spirit makes.

action.name: Strike (Land or Sea)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft., onetarget. Hit: 1d8 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Radiant damage.

action.name: Shred (Sky)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: Bonus equal your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Radiant damage.

monster.description: Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 95 (Homebrew)

monster.name: Spiritual Anamnesis [2024]
monster.save: Str +1, Dex +0, Con +1, Int +0, Wis +1, Cha +0
monster.skill: Acrobatics +0 plus PBx2 (Expert), Perception +1 plus PBx2 (Expert), Stealth +0 plus PBx2 (Expert)
monster.languages: Any languages it knew in life
monster.resist: Acid, Bludgeoning, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Piercing, Slashing, Thunder
monster.immune: Necrotic, Poison; Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained
monster.conditionImmune: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 4 plus four times your Wizard level. The spirit has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your Wizard level.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Misleading Strike (Expert)
trait.text: After successfully passing through a creature's space, the spirit's next attack during that turn is made with Advantage.

trait.name: Spiritual Bond
trait.text: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the spirit makes.

action.name: Spectral Cantrip (Caster)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 60 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 1 plus your Intelligence modifier Necrotic damage.

action.name: Spectral Strike (Expert and Warrior)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 1 plus your Intelligence modifier Slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 119 (Homebrew)
